definition: (of alcohol) to ferment/(of a crisis) to be brewing/to mull over (an issue)/to hold exploratory discussions
to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)

sentences.english: It consists of a simmering metal pot of stock at the center of the dining table.
sentences.chinese: 它由一個金屬罐醞釀的股票爲中心的餐桌。

sentences.english: I have mentioned at least one “perfect storm” brewing on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我已談到地平線上正在醞釀至少一場“雷霆風險”。

sentences.english: SOMETHING is brewing under Japan's Mount Fuji.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山的下面似乎正在醞釀着什麼。

sentences.english: A promise, the preservation period and a few years.
sentences.chinese: 醞釀着的諾言，保存期又有幾年。

sentences.english: What goes on inside your brain when you exercise?
sentences.chinese: 當你鍛鍊時你的大腦內部醞釀着什麼？

sentences.english: But when it is a matter of baobabs , that always means a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 但是有關巴爾巴巨樹的話，就意味將醞釀成災禍了。

sentences.english: As to the speech of welcome, I have brewed a little, and got a general outline .
sentences.chinese: 關於歡迎詞我昨天醞釀了一下，大概有個輪廓。

sentences.english: It may ferment soul- stirringly section of sentiments.
sentences.chinese: 它可以把一段感情醞釀到驚心動魄。

sentences.english: The company seems to definitely have something brewing, however.
sentences.chinese: 不過蘋果看起來絕對是在醞釀什麼動作。

sentences.english: Now, the letter is still lingering in my heart, while the receiver had gone.
sentences.chinese: 而如今，信還在心裏醞釀，收信的人已渺然不知所向。

sentences.english: Such success may have bred complacency.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的成績可能已經醞釀了驕傲自滿的情緒。

sentences.english: A plan fermented in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他心頭在醞釀一個計劃。

sentences.english: Unbeknownst to the humans, something evil was brewing in Lette Plane.
sentences.chinese: 不知情的人，一些罪惡正在醞釀在萊特飛機。

sentences.english: The time during the Ming and the Qing Dynasties had witnessed the origination and early development of Chinese painting studies.
sentences.chinese: 明清之際是中國畫學研究的醞釀期，學科特徵初顯。

sentences.english: A temporary compromise today engenders a bigger war tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天的暫時的妥協，即醞釀着明天的更大的戰爭。

sentences.english: The boy just wants to brew mischief.

definition: to settle/to precipitate (solid sediment out of a solution)
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
